title: Account Security Best Practices
content:
# Account Security Best Practices

## Strong Passwords

### Requirements
- Minimum 8 characters
- At least one uppercase letter
- At least one number
- At least one special character
- No common passwords

### Password Manager
We recommend using:
- 1Password
- LastPass
- Dashlane
- Bitwarden

## Enable Two-Factor Authentication

### Why Enable MFA?
- 99.9% protection against account takeover
- Required for admin accounts
- Recommended for all users

### Setup Steps
1. Go to Account Settings > Security
2. Click "Enable Two-Factor Authentication"
3. Choose method (App or SMS)
4. Scan QR code with authenticator app
5. Enter verification code
6. Save backup codes

### Recommended Apps
- Google Authenticator
- Authy
- Microsoft Authenticator

## Account Recovery

### Save Backup Codes
- 10 single-use codes generated
- Store in password manager
- Print and keep in safe place
- Use if you lose access to MFA device

### Trusted Devices
Mark devices you use regularly:
- Skip MFA for 30 days on trusted devices
- Can revoke trust at any time
- View all trusted devices in settings

## Recognizing Suspicious Activity

### Warning Signs
- Login from unfamiliar location
- Login from new device
- Password reset requests you didn't make
- Account locked unexpectedly

### What to Do
1. Change password immediately
2. Review recent account activity
3. Revoke all sessions
4. Enable MFA if not already enabled
5. Contact support if concerned

## Privacy Settings

### Information Sharing
Control what's visible:
- Profile information
- Order history
- Reviews and ratings
- Wishlist

### Marketing Preferences
Manage communications:
- Promotional emails
- SMS notifications
- Personalized recommendations
- Third-party sharing

## Regular Maintenance
- Change password every 90 days
- Review authorized devices monthly
- Check login activity weekly
- Update recovery email/phone

## If Your Account is Compromised
1. **Immediately:**
   - Reset password
   - Enable MFA
   - Review orders for unauthorized purchases
   
2. **Check:**
   - Saved payment methods
   - Shipping addresses
   - Account email/phone
   
3. **Contact Support:**
   - Report the incident
   - Request security review
   - Monitor account for 30 days

## Support
- Security incidents: security@company.com
- General questions: support@company.com
- Phone: 1-800-XXX-XXXX
